home.guarantee: At {{company}} we guarantee that our SMS UI is easy to use and fast with advanced features such as adding recipients on a fly i.e It enables you to upload Text or CSV files containing numbers of recipients.
home.intro: {{company}} enables our clients to send Bulk SMS to their frequent customer(s), to promote their products, send special notifications about an offer or brand release.
home.intro1: You can send Bulk SMS directly from your internet enabled PC using your {{company}} User Account, by simply Logging into or Registering for an account on our website.
